original_text: And he came to a certain place and stayed there that night, because the sun had set. Taking one of the stones of the place, he put it under his head and lay down in that place to sleep.
korean_text: 한 곳에 이르러는 해가 진지라 거기서 유숙하려고 그 곳의 한 돌을 가져다가 베개로 삼고 거기 누워 자더니

sentences.original_text: And he came to a certain place
Taking one of the stones of the place
sentences.korean_translation: 그 곳의 돌 중 하나를 가져

sentences.original_text: he put it under his head
and lay down in that place to sleep
